item.description:
The Connecticut Chapters of The John Birch Society & the Connecticut Oath Keepers are hosting a second Agenda 21 workshop, as a follow up to our November meeting. During this session we will discuss the “Action Steps” that we have taken since November. We will also make plans to set up committees in several regions across the state, and find volunteers to lead them. The promoters of Agenda 21 are very well organized. The only way to combat them and defeat them is to be very well organized as well. If you hope to defeat this great threat to our freedom and private property rights, please make sure to attend this event. Hal Shurtleff the Regional Field Director of The John Birch Society & John Beidler of Connecticut Oath Keepers will serve as the moderators. We will have literature tables with books, DVD’s and handouts on Agenda 21. Education is the key to victory.

Admission: $5:00

Sponsored by Connecticut Oath Keepers & The John Birch Society

For more information, contact:

John Beidler
203-808-2143
ctok@cox.net

or

Kip Webster
973-934-1775
kwebster@JBS.org

Hal Shurtleff was born and raised in Boston, MA. He served nine years in the U.S. Army and Army Reserve. Hal joined The John Birch Society in 1988, and started a local chapter in 1989. He came on the staff of The JBS in 1990. Hal was appointed as a JBS Regional Field Director in 2000. He has appeared as a guest on numerous television and radio shows, & as a speaker at patriotic and civic organizations. Hal is a well sought after speaker on Agenda 21.

John Beidler has been active in many liberty groups in Connecticut for a number of years. He is the State Chapter President of Oath Keepers, Chapter Leader and proud member of The John Birch Society and the Constitution Lobby, & Treasurer of the Connecticut Citizens Defense League. John believes that the most effective means we have to fulfill our obligations as United States citizens is to stand-up, speak-up, step-up and get involved with like-minded patriots who support the tenets of the Declaration of Independence, the U.S. Constitution & the Bill of Rights
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the main entrance and check with the front desk at the Holiday Inn Express. There are a few meeting rooms on premises and we are not sure at this time which of the rooms we will conduct our meeting in.
item.name: Agenda 21 Seminar and Workshop Part 2
